Article.Title: Price adjustments
Article.Content:
For å justere prisen legges parameteren &priceAdjustment=m20p på i spørringen.
The Shipping Guide provides adjustment of prices shown. This service is available both in XML API and in Levert av Bring. To adjust the price, add &priceAdjustment=m20p to the query.

The parameter is build up in the form [produktkode_][o]10[p]. Parts of the parameter whit square brackets ( [] ) is optional. Explanation of the parameters follows:

  • produktkode_ used if price adjustments are only made for a single product. Example: &priceAdjustment=SERVICEPAKKE_m20 lowers the price on product Servicepakke with NOK 20.
  • o specifies the operation to be performed. Operations supported are 'p' for positive, 'm' for negative or blank for a fixed price adjustment. Examples:
    • &priceAdjustment=m20 deducts NOK 20 on all products.
    • &priceAdjustment=p20 adds NOK 20 to all products.
    • &priceAdjustment=SERVICEPAKKE_79 puts a fixed price on Servicepakke on NOK 79.
  • 10 indicates the factor to be usede in the price adjustment. This number can be a fixed amount or percentage to be added/subtracted, or a fixed price to be added/subtracted depending on other parameters. This number can be set to a fixed amount or be added/subtracted as Dette tallet kan angi et fast kronebeløp som skal legges til/trekkes fra, en prosent som skal legges til/trekkes fra eller en fastpris avhengig av de andre parametrene.
  • p indicates that the operation should be done as a percentage calculation. Note that this is only valid for operations doing additions and subtractions (not fixed prices).

Though not recommended, it is possible to make overlapping queries. If there is a need to do multiple simultaneous price adjustments, it should be done on a product-by-product basis using the product code prefix.

Example: &priceAdjustment=SERVICEPAKKE_79 &priceAdjustment=EKSPRESS09_m20p set fixed price of NOK 79 for Servicepakke and deduct 20% on Bedriftspakke Ekspress Over natten 09.
